mapper.select:
SELECT RRI.id, RRI.refType, RRI.refId, RRI.roleId, RRI.effectiveDate, RRI.expiryDate, RRI.createOperatorId, RRI.createDate, RRI.lastUpdateOperatorId, RRI.lastUpdateDate FROM sec_roleref RRI WHERE
AND RRI.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sec_roleref_his ( id, refType, refId, roleId, effectiveDate, expiryDate, createOperatorId, createDate, lastUpdateOperatorId, lastUpdateDate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{refType}, #{refId}, #{roleId}, #{effectiveDate}, #{expiryDate}, #{createOperatorId}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdateOperatorId}, #{lastUpdateDate} )

INSERT INTO sec_roleref ( id, refType, refId, roleId, effectiveDate, expiryDate, createOperatorId, createDate, lastUpdateOperatorId, lastUpdateDate ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{refType}, #{refId}, #{roleId}, #{effectiveDate}, #{expiryDate}, #{createOperatorId}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdateOperatorId}, #{lastUpdateDate} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM sec_roleref WHERE
AND ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE sec_roleref
refType = #{refType,javaType=java.lang.String},
refId = #{refId,javaType=java.lang.String},
roleId = #{roleId,javaType=java.lang.String},
effectiveDate = #{effectiveDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
expiryDate = #{expiryDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
lastUpdateOperatorId = #{lastUpdateOperatorId,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE ID = #{id}
